languages.text: "Теодора погибла при нападении культистов прямо здесь, в системе Райкад. Я принял{mf||а} бразды правления".
"Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."
languages.original_text: "Теодора погибла при нападении культистов прямо здесь, в системе Райкад. Я принял{mf||а} бразды правления".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora perished in a pirate attack that took place here in the Rykad System. I took up the reins of power."
"Theodora perished in a pirate attack that took place here in the Rykad System. I took up the reins of power."
"Theodora perished in a pirate raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."
"Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."
"Theodora perished in a pirate raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."
"Theodora perished in a pirate raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."
"Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

languages.text: «Theodora falleció en un ataque de cultistas que, de hecho, ocurrió aquí en el sistema Rykad. Fue entonces cuando asumí el mando».
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: «Theodora falleció en un ataque pirata que, de hecho, ocurrió aquí en el sistema Rykad. Fue entonces cuando asumí el mando».

languages.text: "Theodora ist bei einem Angriff von Kultisten ums Leben gekommen, hier im Rykad-System. Ich habe daraufhin das Ruder übernommen."
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora ist bei einem Piratenangriff ums Leben gekommen, hier im Rykad-System. Ich habe daraufhin das Ruder übernommen."

languages.text: « Théodora a trouvé la mort lors d'une attaque de cultistes, qui s'est justement déroulée ici, dans le système de Rykad. C'est suite à cet événement que j'ai pris la tête de la maison. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora a trouvé la mort lors d'une attaque de pirates, qui s'est justement déroulée ici, dans le système de Rykad. C'est suite à cet événement que j'ai pris la tête de la maison. »

languages.text: “西奥多拉在邪教分子的袭击中身亡，那场袭击就发生在莱卡德星系。我就是从那时开始执掌大权的。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉在海盗袭击中身亡，那场袭击就发生在莱卡德星系。我就是从那时开始执掌大权的。”

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様は、このライカド星系で魔女団に襲われて命を落とした。その時、実権を握ったのが私だ」
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラは、このライカド星系で海賊に襲われて命を落とした。その時、実権を握ったのが{mf|俺|私}だ」
「シオドーラ様は、このライカド星系で魔女団に襲われて命を落とした。その時、実権を握ったのが私だ」

languages.text: "Theodora burada, Rykad Sistemi'nde gerçekleşen bir tarikatçı baskınında hayatını kaybetti. Başa geçişim bu şekilde oldu."
languages.original_text: "Theodora perished in a cultist raid, one that took place right here in the Rykad System. That is when I took the helm."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora burada, Rykad Sistemi'nde gerçekleşen bir tarikatçı baskınında hayatını kaybetti. Başa geçişim bu şekilde oldu."
